Noble.description: Born into wealth and influence, navigating courts with ease.

abilities.name: Courtly Grace
abilities.description: +10 to persuasion with nobles and officials.

Hunter.description: A tracker of beasts and men, at home in the wilds.

Scholar.description: A seeker of forbidden knowledge, versed in ancient lore.

abilities.name: Arcane Insight
abilities.description: +10 to lore and magic identification checks.

Outlaw.description: A fugitive thriving in the empire’s shadows.

abilities.name: Underworld Ties
abilities.description: +10 to dealings with criminals and black markets.

Street_Whore.description: A survivor of the empire’s underbelly, trading intimacy for survival among thieves and guards.

abilities.name: Streetwise Charm
abilities.description: +15 to persuasion or deception with city guards, thieves, or informants.

abilities.name: Underworld Contacts
abilities.description: Access low-tier informants or enforcers once per session.

High_End_Escort.description: A courtesan of elite circles, wielding charm and secrets among nobles.

abilities.name: Courtly Influence
abilities.description: +20 to persuasion with aristocrats or officials.

abilities.name: Elite Connections
abilities.description: Call upon a high-ranking ally for favors once per arc.
